title: Dwarf planet Ceres
description: This image, taken by NASA's Dawn spacecraft, shows the surface of dwarf planet Ceres from an altitude of 915 miles (1,470 kilometers). The image, with a resolution of 450 feet (140 meters) per pixel, was taken on August 27, 2015.
theme:
LIFELESS. Desert lands — if you value still
and silent beauty of the cosmos
